name: sparkyfitness
description: SparkyFitness is a self-hosted fitness tracker that logs workouts, goals, and progress over time. It includes stats and charts in a web UI suited for personal training logs.
features: Workout logging: Records exercises, sets, reps, and weights for each session.
Exercise library: Provides database of exercises with instructions and muscle groups.
Progress tracking: Charts strength gains and performance improvements over time.
Workout templates: Creates reusable workout routines for consistent training.
Personal records: Tracks PRs for each exercise automatically.
Body measurements: Logs weight, body fat, and other measurements.
Goal setting: Sets fitness goals and monitors progress toward targets.
Calendar view: Visualizes workout schedule and completed sessions.
Rest timer: Built-in timer for rest periods between sets.
Statistics: Displays workout frequency, volume, and consistency metrics.
Export data: Downloads workout history for backup or analysis.
Mobile app: Logs workouts from gym with Android application.
